name: BATTLE RAP SIMULATOR
description:
Would you like to participate in rap battles?
In the game BATTLE RAP SIMULATOR you will play for the rapper and wildly humiliate your rivals in the battles.

You will need to choose the continuation of your pancakes, which the judges will like.

You must participate in several rep battles, each battle will be evaluated by highly qualified judges. Whether you like it or not, it's up to you.

Features:
- Manual drawing of the schedule
- A sea of humor and references
- The atmosphere of the battles
- Free choice
